title: Levi Strauss Signature Gold Men's Relaxed Fit Flex Jeans (Available in Big & Tall)
description: Same great jeans, brand new name! Signature by Levi Strauss & Co. is now Levi Strauss Signature Gold
Premium denim with ultimate stretch and flex
Relaxed seat and thigh; Straight leg opening
Unique fabric varies in color due to wash, finish, and dye

Crafted from premium durable denim, the Signature by Levi Strauss and Co.™ Men’s Regular Fit Jeans offer a classic fit through the seat and thigh and are cut straight to ankle. There is no shortage of cool when you rock them with a plain white tee and a pair of sneakers. Tee and sneaks or not, the cool factor remains with whatever you choose to wear with your Signature by Levi Strauss and Co.™ Men’s S41 Regular Fit Jeans.
